data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 13,582, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kasese, Uganda
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 80,300 souls living in the state of Kasese with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Kasese, Uganda.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Kasese, Uganda.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Swahili people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Swahili people.
Father, let the threatened of Kasese, Uganda know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Kasese to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Kasese, Uganda.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

location.name: Kasese
location.people_groups_list: Nyang'i, Kaliko, Nubian, Plains Bira, Karamojong
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Nyang'i (18,000), Kaliko (13,000), Nubian (37,000), Plains Bira (2,000), Karamojong (849,000)
